addr: 136 West 21st Street.  Room 418F. New York, NY 10011
title: Business Basics for Artists and Creatives - Part 2: Understanding Copyright and Contracts
desc: The basic principles of copyright law and intellectual property will be presented from the creator?s perspective to help artists understand why maintaining one?s copyright is important to long-term sustainability.? Royalties and licensing fees will be discussed, and sample basic agreements will be provided as examples. Open only to current SVA seniors, graduate students and alumni.
